name: S.P.A.T.
description:
This is not just a hunt. You have a unique opportunity to feel like an operator of a special squad to fight paranormal creatures and monsters (Special Paranormal Assault Team - S.P.A.T.). Solve difficult problems with unknown monsters in the dark corners of the earth.

Features:

- Single or team play (up to 4 people in a squad)
- Complete different tasks that change every time
- 3 types of main monsters
- Not only big monsters await you, but also a bunch of smaller dangers
- Hunting is much more interesting because you have special detectors for detecting monsters
- Various types of weapons and special equipment
- Gloomy atmosphere
